Actions.Name: Delete row
Actions.Description: Deletes a row from an Excel table

Actions.Name: Get row
Actions.Description: Retrieves a single row from an Excel table

Actions.Name: Get rows
Actions.Description: Retrieves rows from an Excel table

Actions.Name: Get tables
Actions.Description: Retrieves table names from an Excel file

Actions.Name: Update row
Actions.Description: Updates an existing row in an Excel table

Actions.Name: Insert row
Actions.Description: Inserts a new row into an Excel table
